mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONENUMBER, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_ID, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATE_ID, PHONENUMBER, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, CREATE_DT, ROLE, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{createId}, #{phonenumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{birthdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE, #{role}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET DEL_YN = 'Y', UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
